page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: "Hurray I am going swimming at Swansea" I shouted when I woke up at {8:30a.m.}and had my breakfast of{three {weetabix}. I found my swimming trunks at about{8:45a.m.}We jumped in the car and went to see Nan who came with us. We drove in the car for about half an hour. Unfortunately the pool was shut for the day and we were all very disappointed at it and Nan suggested to go to Aberavan Lido Pool and we all thought that was a good idea so we went to Aberavan which was about 5 miles away. We were in the pool for half an hour and went for a walk along the pier, took some pictures and walked along the beach looking at shells. Then we went to the fair and had a ride on a few things. Then we went into Swansea to the cinema to see the film called"A View to a Kill"the latest James Bond.
